items.title: Arteta calls for Gyokeres to embrace the noise amid Arsenal title charge
items.summary: Mikel Arteta has called for Viktor Gyokeres and his Arsenal team-mates to embrace the noise surrounding the squad, while also insisting it will "click" for the Swedish striker eventually in north London.

items.title: Romantische transfer: Gross na twee jaar weer terug bij Brighton
items.summary: Pascal Gross is weer speler van Brighton & Hove Albion. De 34-jarige Duitser vertrekt voor een bescheiden transfersom bij Borussia Dortmund.

items.title: Wijnaldum heeft smaak te pakken: voor vijfde keer op rij gescoord
items.summary: Georginio Wijnaldum (35) is uitstekend aan het nieuwe jaar begonnen. Hij maakte tegen Al Akhdoud zijn achtste en negende doelpunt van het seizoen voor Al-Ettifaq.

items.title: 'Critics try to kill me but I need time' - Nancy's plea before Old Firm test
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy launches a passionate defence of his methods and stresses the need for time if he is to succeed at Celtic.

items.title: Villa 'not convinced' to sign Elliott permanently - Emery
items.summary: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery says the club were "not convinced" two months ago to sign Harvey Elliott permanently.

items.title: Milik ziet rentree na 588 dagen in het water vallen
items.summary: Arkadiusz Milik is 2026 niet goed begonnen. De Poolse spits leek dit weekend na een afwezigheid van 588 dagen Ã©Ã­ndelijk zijn rentree te kunnen maken voor Juventus. De ex-Ajacied is echter opnieuw geblesseerd geraakt.

items.title: VOTE FOR YOUR FINALISTS! Littler vs Searle and Van Veen vs Anderson
FC Transfervrij: dit Eredivisie-elftal is in de zomer gratis op te pikken
items.summary: Clubs opgelet! De jaarwisseling is verstreken en dus mogen alle voetballers met een aflopend contract vrijuit praten met andere clubs, met het oog op een transfervrije overstap komende zomer. Van geroutineerde leiders tot talentvolle parels: de Eredivisie heeft van alles in de aanbieding. VI stelde een elftal samen van Eredivisie-spelers die medio 2026 uit hun contract lopen.

items.title: Johnson 'excited to join Palace journey' after Â£35m move
items.summary: Brennan Johnson is set to be included in Crystal Palace's squad to face Newcastle on Sunday after his club-record Â£35m move from Tottenham was finalised on Friday.

items.title: Crystal Palace seal club-record Â£35m Brennan Johnson transfer from Spurs
items.summary: Manager Glasner pleased club got deal done swiftly Johnson says he is â€˜super excitedâ€™ to make move Oliver Glasner credited Crystal Palaceâ€™s hierarchy for completing the signing of Brennan Johnson from Tottenham for a club record Â£35m on the second day of the transfer window. The Wales forward has a four-and-a-half-year deal and is expected to be part of Palaceâ€™s squad that will face Newcastle on Sunday. Glasner has made no secret of his desire to bolster the FA Cup winners after a demanding debut campaign in Europe and has criticised Palaceâ€™s lack of preparedness in previous transfer windows. But the Austrian manager said he was delighted with the signing of the 24-year-old after Palace saw off competition from Bournemouth. Continue reading...

items.title: Bournemouth laat vrouwenteam 25 kilometer verderop spelen om grasmat te beschermen
items.summary: Bournemouth heeft zich de woede van de achterban van het vrouwenteam op de hals gehaald. Het historische FA Cup-duel van dat team tegen Manchester City wordt niet in het Vitality Stadium gespeeld om het veld te sparen. Dat wordt Bournemouth niet in dank afgenomen.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior frontrunner to replace Maresca
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading candidate to succeed Enzo Maresca as Chelsea head coach, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Pep denies Maresca, City links: 'I have a contract'
items.summary: Pep Guardiola has reiterated his desire to stay on at Manchester City amid fresh rumours surrounding Enzo Maresca.

items.title: Neymar hint about next contract teased
items.summary: Santos have indicated that Neymar will be with the club until the end of the year.

items.title: 'Give me time!' - EVERY WORD of Nancy's extraordinary Celtic rant before Old Firm
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy has demanded he be given more time to make his mark at Celtic after an extraordinary seven-minute rant.

items.title: 'Crazy 24 hours' - McFarlane ready for Chelsea chance
items.summary: Chelsea interim manager Calum McFarlane says it has been a "crazy" 24 hours since replacing Enzo Maresca at Stamford Bridge.

items.title: 'Good idea' or taking 'massive chance' - is Rosenior ready for Chelsea?
items.summary: Liam Rosenior is the leading candidate to become the Chelsea manager. BBC Sport looks at the reasons why.

The Premier League champions are 12 points adrift of Mikel Artetaâ€™s leaders after a goalless draw with Leeds on New Yearâ€™s Day. Liverpool are unbeaten in eight matches and back in the Champions League places after recovering from the clubâ€™s worst run in 71 years, yet remain unconvincing.
